answers.answer: Do you have a NICU, at your hospital.  My coworker had preeclampsia and had to deliver her baby at 31 weeks. Her baby stayed in the hospital till she gained enough weight and she was discharged. The baby and mother are both healthy and doing good now.

Yes I got transported by ambulance from the hospital I would have originally delivered at to a larger hospital with a great NICU. Just hoping he hangs on a little longer. Will have a full high risk ultra sound to check fluid levels and measurements.

question: Really scared. I have been admitted due to contractions 1-5 minutes apart, when going in with stomach bug issues and dehydration comes to find out I'm having pretty regular contractions. On my second IV drip of magnesium to try and stop the contractions and it isn't working. Currently 90% thinned and 2 CM dialated.  Prayers he stays put a little longer. Has anyone else delivered this early and was baby ok??
title: labor at 31 weeks 5 days
